text.section:
The Corporation may:
lend or otherwise make available the proceeds of bonds to a person to finance costs of a project; and
enter into financing agreements, mortgages, and other instruments that it determines are necessary or desirable to evidence or secure the loan.

section.section:
The lease for a project may require or authorize the lessee or another person to purchase or otherwise acquire the property for consideration that the Corporation establishes, when:
the principal of and interest on the bonds that financed the cost of the project are paid; or
provision satisfactory to the Corporation is made for their payment.
Consideration required under paragraph (1) of this subsection may be nominal.
